body: The snapping turtle style emphasizes active defense with one hand. Students of the style utilize a variety of locks, grabs, and circular blocks to protect themselves, as well as employing a debilitating clutch.Feat Path: Snapping Turtle Style, Snapping Turtle Clutch, Snapping Turtle Shell.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Style Feats/Snapping Turtle Style
name: Snapping Turtle Style
